name: Space Slam (itch)
description:
Slam your opponent out of an arena in this  split-screen multiplayer game

Play against a friend or the computer in 4 different arenas

Controls

Players move by building up power, then releasing to move forwards in sharp bursts. When fully charged, jump to avoid incoming attack or get back on stage
